entry.title: Thursday: Drizzle or freezing drizzle. High 12.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle changing to drizzle this morning and ending near noon then clearing. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 12. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
